Yes No Recording options Delete Play Send Your record from your phone This is a call record from your phone About Call recorder by Kobi Krasnoff and Raul Robledo Close Send Mail Withheld Number Call recording enabled Call recording disabled There are no recordings in this phone.\nTo enable record ability open the main menu and choose \"Enable call recording\".\nAfter that the application will record all your incoming and outgoing calls. Enable call recording Disable call recording Please choose if the application should record your calls.\nYou can always enable or disable recording by pressing the Android menu button. Welcome Screen There is no memory card in your device.\nPlease install one. Close Terms of use Privacy Policy Terms of use Privacy Policy Please click the buttons below to see the terms of use and privacy policy Delete All recordings Delete everything? Are you sure you want to delete all of your recordings? Yes No Recording is now Starting The phone is now on a call If recording was enabled, recording should have started, if not you can enable recording in the application, the phone will stop the recording when the conversation ends Unfortunately, it is not possible to record calls in this device. (Usually because another application/service is using the microphone in the background) You should open speaker, enter yes to open?
